GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4.126 to before v5.4.168
GSD.description:
rds: memory leak in __rds_conn_create()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.168 by commit 166f0adf7e7525c87595ceadb21a91e2a9519a1e, it was introduced in version v5.4.126 by commit a3842219a69d23d3b7cc72274af1beb51434449a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
